content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. While discussing the rental price for this desirable apartment in Magdeburg's city center, let me emphasize its prime location and contemporary features. However, due to its high demand, I'm aiming for a competitive rate. Shall we start with an initial proposal of 1100 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite high, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment. I would suggest a more reasonable price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because an unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center warrants a higher valuation than your proposed 800 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mrs. Müller, considering the location and the fact that it's newly built, I can meet you halfway. I propose 900 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euros!\
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
